00099 DdNode *
00100 Cudd_bddClippingAnd(
00101   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00102   DdNode * f /* first conjunct */,
00103   DdNode * g /* second conjunct */,
00104   int  maxDepth /* maximum recursion depth */,
00105   int  direction /* under (0) or over (1) approximation */)
00106 {
00107     DdNode *res;
00108 
00109     do {
00110         dd->reordered = 0;
00111         res = cuddBddClippingAnd(dd,f,g,maxDepth,direction);
00112     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00113     return(res);
00114 
00115 } /* end of Cudd_bddClippingAnd */

00239 static DdNode *
00240 cuddBddClippingAndRecur(
00241   DdManager * manager,
00242   DdNode * f,
00243   DdNode * g,
00244   int  distance,
00245   int  direction)
00246 {
00247     DdNode *F, *ft, *fe, *G, *gt, *ge;
00248     DdNode *one, *zero, *r, *t, *e;
00249     unsigned int topf, topg, index;
00250     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00251 
00252     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00253     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00254 
00255     /* Terminal cases. */
00256     if (f == zero || g == zero || f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(zero);
00257     if (f == g || g == one) return(f);
00258     if (f == one) return(g);
00259     if (distance == 0) {
00260         /* One last attempt at returning the right result. We sort of
00261         ** cheat by calling Cudd_bddLeq. */
00262         if (Cudd_bddLeq(manager,f,g)) return(f);
00263         if (Cudd_bddLeq(manager,g,f)) return(g);
00264         if (direction == 1) {
00265             if (Cudd_bddLeq(manager,f,Cudd_Not(g)) ||
00266                 Cudd_bddLeq(manager,g,Cudd_Not(f))) return(zero);
00267         }
00268         return(Cudd_NotCond(one,(direction == 0)));
00269     }
00270 
00271     /* At this point f and g are not constant. */
00272     distance--;
00273 
00274     /* Check cache. Try to increase cache efficiency by sorting the
00275     ** pointers. */
00276     if (f > g) {
00277         DdNode *tmp = f;
00278         f = g; g = tmp;
00279     }
00280     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00281     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00282     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *))
00283         (direction ? Cudd_bddClippingAnd : cuddBddClippingAnd);
00284     if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1) {
00285         r = cuddCacheLookup2(manager, cacheOp, f, g);
00286         if (r != NULL) return(r);
00287     }
00288 
00289     /* Here we can skip the use of cuddI, because the operands are known
00290     ** to be non-constant.
00291     */
00292     topf = manager->perm[F->index];
00293     topg = manager->perm[G->index];
00294 
00295     /* Compute cofactors. */
00296     if (topf <= topg) {
00297         index = F->index;
00298         ft = cuddT(F);
00299         fe = cuddE(F);
00300         if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00301             ft = Cudd_Not(ft);
00302             fe = Cudd_Not(fe);
00303         }
00304     } else {
00305         index = G->index;
00306         ft = fe = f;
00307     }
00308 
00309     if (topg <= topf) {
00310         gt = cuddT(G);
00311         ge = cuddE(G);
00312         if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00313             gt = Cudd_Not(gt);
00314             ge = Cudd_Not(ge);
00315         }
00316     } else {
00317         gt = ge = g;
00318     }
00319 
00320     t = cuddBddClippingAndRecur(manager, ft, gt, distance, direction);
00321     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00322     cuddRef(t);
00323     e = cuddBddClippingAndRecur(manager, fe, ge, distance, direction);
00324     if (e == NULL) {
00325         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00326         return(NULL);
00327     }
00328     cuddRef(e);
00329 
00330     if (t == e) {
00331         r = t;
00332     } else {
00333         if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
00334             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,Cudd_Not(t),Cudd_Not(e));
00335             if (r == NULL) {
00336                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00337                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, e);
00338                 return(NULL);
00339             }
00340             r = Cudd_Not(r);
00341         } else {
00342             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,t,e);
00343             if (r == NULL) {
00344                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00345                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, e);
00346                 return(NULL);
00347             }
00348         }
00349     }
00350     cuddDeref(e);
00351     cuddDeref(t);
00352     if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1)
00353         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, cacheOp, f, g, r);
00354     return(r);
00355 
00356 } /* end of cuddBddClippingAndRecur */
00357 
00358 
00374 static DdNode *
00375 cuddBddClipAndAbsRecur(
00376   DdManager * manager,
00377   DdNode * f,
00378   DdNode * g,
00379   DdNode * cube,
00380   int  distance,
00381   int  direction)
00382 {
00383     DdNode *F, *ft, *fe, *G, *gt, *ge;
00384     DdNode *one, *zero, *r, *t, *e, *Cube;
00385     unsigned int topf, topg, topcube, top, index;
00386     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00387 
00388     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00389     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00390 
00391     /* Terminal cases. */
00392     if (f == zero || g == zero || f == Cudd_Not(g)) return(zero);
00393     if (f == one && g == one)   return(one);
00394     if (cube == one) {
00395         return(cuddBddClippingAndRecur(manager, f, g, distance, direction));
00396     }
00397     if (f == one || f == g) {
00398         return (cuddBddExistAbstractRecur(manager, g, cube));
00399     }
00400     if (g == one) {
00401         return (cuddBddExistAbstractRecur(manager, f, cube));
00402     }
00403     if (distance == 0) return(Cudd_NotCond(one,(direction == 0)));
00404 
00405     /* At this point f, g, and cube are not constant. */
00406     distance--;
00407 
00408     /* Check cache. */
00409     if (f > g) { /* Try to increase cache efficiency. */
00410         DdNode *tmp = f;
00411         f = g; g = tmp;
00412     }
00413     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00414     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00415     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *))
00416         (direction ? Cudd_bddClippingAndAbstract : cuddBddClippingAndAbstract);
00417     if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1) {
00418         r = cuddCacheLookup(manager, cacheOp, f, g, cube);
00419         if (r != NULL) {
00420             return(r);
00421         }
00422     }
00423 
00424     /* Here we can skip the use of cuddI, because the operands are known
00425     ** to be non-constant.
00426     */
00427     topf = manager->perm[F->index];
00428     topg = manager->perm[G->index];
00429     top = ddMin(topf, topg);
00430     topcube = manager->perm[cube->index];
00431 
00432     if (topcube < top) {
00433         return(cuddBddClipAndAbsRecur(manager, f, g, cuddT(cube),
00434                                       distance, direction));
00435     }
00436     /* Now, topcube >= top. */
00437 
00438     if (topf == top) {
00439         index = F->index;
00440         ft = cuddT(F);
00441         fe = cuddE(F);
00442         if (Cudd_IsComplement(f)) {
00443             ft = Cudd_Not(ft);
00444             fe = Cudd_Not(fe);
00445         }
00446     } else {
00447         index = G->index;
00448         ft = fe = f;
00449     }
00450 
00451     if (topg == top) {
00452         gt = cuddT(G);
00453         ge = cuddE(G);
00454         if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00455             gt = Cudd_Not(gt);
00456             ge = Cudd_Not(ge);
00457         }
00458     } else {
00459         gt = ge = g;
00460     }
00461 
00462     if (topcube == top) {
00463         Cube = cuddT(cube);
00464     } else {
00465         Cube = cube;
00466     }
00467 
00468     t = cuddBddClipAndAbsRecur(manager, ft, gt, Cube, distance, direction);
00469     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00470 
00471     /* Special case: 1 OR anything = 1. Hence, no need to compute
00472     ** the else branch if t is 1.
00473     */
00474     if (t == one && topcube == top) {
00475         if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1)
00476             cuddCacheInsert(manager, cacheOp, f, g, cube, one);
00477         return(one);
00478     }
00479     cuddRef(t);
00480 
00481     e = cuddBddClipAndAbsRecur(manager, fe, ge, Cube, distance, direction);
00482     if (e == NULL) {
00483         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00484         return(NULL);
00485     }
00486     cuddRef(e);
00487 
00488     if (topcube == top) {       /* abstract */
00489         r = cuddBddClippingAndRecur(manager, Cudd_Not(t), Cudd_Not(e),
00490                                     distance, (direction == 0));
00491         if (r == NULL) {
00492             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00493             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, e);
00494             return(NULL);
00495         }
00496         r = Cudd_Not(r);
00497         cuddRef(r);
00498         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00499         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, e);
00500         cuddDeref(r);
00501     } else if (t == e) {
00502         r = t;
00503         cuddDeref(t);
00504         cuddDeref(e);
00505     } else {
00506         if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
00507             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,Cudd_Not(t),Cudd_Not(e));
00508             if (r == NULL) {
00509                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00510                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, e);
00511                 return(NULL);
00512             }
00513             r = Cudd_Not(r);
00514         } else {
00515             r = cuddUniqueInter(manager,(int)index,t,e);
00516             if (r == NULL) {
00517                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, t);
00518                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager, e);
00519                 return(NULL);
00520             }
00521         }
00522         cuddDeref(e);
00523         cuddDeref(t);
00524     }
00525     if (F->ref != 1 || G->ref != 1)
00526         cuddCacheInsert(manager, cacheOp, f, g, cube, r);
00527     return (r);
00528 
00529 } /* end of cuddBddClipAndAbsRecur */
